item.title: MUN
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
Where did the MUN section on your website go? As I am no longer active in MUN (not sure if that’s “retirement”), MUN seizes to be a big part of my life. Archive posts, however can still be accessed here: vpchris.com/mun What about your edited Rules and Procedures? Still available (though I have not update…
Read more
item.content:encoded:
1. Where did the MUN section on your website go? As I am no longer active in MUN (not sure if that’s “retirement”), MUN seizes to be a big part of my life. Archive posts, however can still be accessed here: vpchris.com/mun
  2. What about your edited Rules and Procedures? Still available (though I have not update it at all), just drop me a line. But there is no reason why you should rely on my RoP as there are so many great and updated RoPs out there!
  3. Can I still invite you to a conference? Sure, but make sure it’s a good one.
  4. Can I see your MUN CV? Here
  5. Should I go into MUN? Perhaps a bit biased: definitely.
  6. But my english is bad, I’m not sure. Tough luck that you’re reading this.
  7. But I don’t want a political career. Yeah sure all MUNers ended up being presidents for their countries. (Not)
  8. Should I represent my own country? No.
